name: No Hope
description:
No Hope is the first game release from Helemon studio. It is as survival horror game based on classics of the genre. A humble tribute.

Montenegro is a city that has suffered a serious supernatural disaster. Ancient darkness fell over the city, possessing people. Those possessed are scattered throughout the city and have already killed the majority of the population. What is the source of all this evil and what dark secrets does this city keep?

What would you do if you woke up and when you looked out the window, the sky was red and the clouds were black?

  • Discover secrets of the city and its inhabitants while looking for resources.
  • Watch your ammunition - Kill all monsters or save ammo for a critical moment?
